title: Madame Yayas Hot Foot Powder
features: Instructions and Tips for use included.
Powders can be used in combination with our oils and incense for increased effectiveness

Disclaimer: Our products and their components are passed down through a long history of believers in Ritualistic and Spiritual practices with no natural proof. They are used by many believers of varying ritualistic arts who have deemed them legendary. We offer no guarantees of the efficacy or therapeutic properties of our items.
description: Are you having trouble dealing with your enemies? Do you feel there are people around you that are out to get you? Madame Yayas high quality Hot Foot Powder might be just what you need. Used in traditional folk magic practices such as hoodoo, Hot Foot Powder is a special blend of herbs and minerals that has been used for years to keep unwanted people away from the practitioner. Hot Foot Powder typically contains cayenne and black pepper as well as sulfur. Our Hot Foot Powder has these ingredients and more for added potency. Our powder contains sulfur, salt, High John the Conqueror Incense, and cayenne and black pepper to help keep any unwanted persons away from you and your loved ones.Â Your order comes includes Hot Foot Powder inside a 2 inch by 3 inch bag.
